alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison; Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 5:51PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Harrison, northern Hancock and southeastern Pearl River Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 551 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Mcneil, or 10 miles northeast of Picayune, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Picayune, Mcneil and Kiln. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 59 in Louisiana near mile marker 11. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
